meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, 6ES Council Briefing, and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Case Docket
agenda_items.description: Uncontested Items - Holdover Items - Individual Items

agenda_items.title: BDA234-140(CJ) 12908 Windfall Circle
agenda_items.description: Application of Jordan DSilva for a variance to the side-yard setback regulations.

agenda_items.title: BDA234-146(CJ) 3226 Lawnview Avenue
agenda_items.description: Application of Raul Cortes Garcia for a special exception to the fence height regulations, and for a special exception to the fence opacity regulations.

agenda_items.title: BDA234-154(CJ) 4119 Mehalia Drive
agenda_items.description: Application of Ana Castro for a variance to the floor area ratio for structures accessory to single-family uses regulations.

agenda_items.title: BDA234-150(BT) 5631 Alta Avenue
agenda_items.description: Application of Rob Baldwin for a variance to the front-yard setback regulations, a special exception to the visibility triangle regulations at the intersection of a street and alley, and a special exception to the visibility triangle regulations at drive approaches.

agenda_items.title: BDA234-132(BT) 1000 N. Riverfront Boulevard
agenda_items.description: Application of Andrew Hooper represented by Mike Davis for a special exception to the parking regulations.
